H0.text: Which American city is home to the Basketball side 'The Wizards'. Chicago

H1.text: Which American city is home to the Basketball side 'The Wizards'. Los Angeles

H2.text: Which American city is home to the Basketball side 'The Wizards'. New York City

H3.text: Which American city is home to the Basketball side 'The Wizards'. WASHINGTON

A4.text: The Washington Wizards are an American professional basketball team based in Washington, D.C.

A5.text: The team plays its home games at Capital One Arena, in the Chinatown neighborhood of Washington, D.C.
